lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump is defending himself against claims that he donated $25,000 to a group supporting the Florida attorney general to sway her office’s review of Trump University.

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett, Amy Chozick and Maggie Haberman contributed reporting.
byline.original: By STEVE EDER and MEGAN TWOHEY

headline.print_headline: Trump Donation  His Latest Brush With Fund Rules
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Donation Is His Latest Brush With Campaign Fund Rules

snippet: Mr. Trump is defending himself against claims that he donated $25,000 to a group supporting the Florida attorney general to sway her office’s review of Trump University....
abstract: Donald J Trump is defending himself against accusations he donated $25,000 to campaign group supporting Florida Atty Gen Pam Bondi in 2013 in effort to influence her review of fraud allegations at Trump University; incident is latest in decades-long string of attempts by trump to circumvent rules governing contributions and lobbying.
